remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是能够分析各种格式的字符串。The method is capable of parsing strings in various formats. 可识别的字符串格式由以下的格式模式。The recognizable string formats are composed out of the following format patterns. |格式模式Format Pattern|描述Description|示例Examples| |--------------------|-----------------|--------------| |yyyyyyyy|年份采用 4 位数字格式。The year in 4-digit format.|1999, 18121999, 1812| |zzzzzz|完整时区偏移量 （小时和分钟） 从通用协调时间 （格林威治标准时间）。The full time zone offset (hour and minutes) from the Universal Time Coordinate (Greenwich Mean Time). 一位数小时具有前导零。Single-digit hours have a leading zero.|-07:00, 08:00-07:00, 08:00| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例是一个更大的示例为提供的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear/CPP/demo.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapYear/CS/demo.cs#11)]
